song.title: Shiver
song.info: basehead/klf 1994 = rub-uh-bub-bub = klf-on-da-dub = samples: greg, man&tip, necros, pm, bit, sidewinder, brainbug, c.c.catch, sampleman, 'n' dr.bully 86bpm ambdub tracked for EGG #2 greetinx: maelcum + other klf scrubs, all others on my nutsaq. orb, ultramarine, opus3, and all the shit i blast on my system daily. no respekts 2: 2untalented, r.kelly, mike bolton, mariah carey, crash test dummies, offspring, counting crows... peece.
